Simple & Efficient CPS Bags

  • Combo Bags
  • CPS Bag
  • Sales Bags 32-40
  • Top Loading Catheter Bag
  • Travel Bag

Cardiac Positioning Equipment Bags

These custom- designed bags provide a simple, efficient way to hold and organize all of your catheters, long boxes, or heart failure supplies. Carry it over your shoulder with a padded shoulder strap or on your side with a contoured grab handle. You can also order it with our heavy-duty wheel system. We can put any logo or embroidery on the bag.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 3 sides of the bag
  • Interior foam padding and exterior hard plastic to protect your equipment
  • Commercial grade materials
  • 4 zipper pockets for literature and product storage
  • Contoured grab handle on front so you can carry it like a briefcase
  • Customizable interior with removable divider system
  • 2 contoured grab handles on the ends to help you lift it into your vehicle
  • Removable padded shoulder strap

 

CPS Bag-No Wheels

  • Rigid Weight: 11.5 lbs
  • Lightened Weight: 9.5 lbs
  • External Dimensions: 11" Deep x 16" Wide x 38" Long 
  • Internal Dimensions: 10" Deep x 15" Wide x 37" Long

  • Watts Wheel System: Yes

 If you like this bag style but need different bag dimensions, check out our Attain Delivery System Bag, Accuity Bag, or Small Piggyback Bag. All of these bags are the same besides the size.
